manager.name: Gerard Stone
manager.describe: A natural craftsman, Gerard is the driving creative force behind our work. From concept, to testing, to execution, his thorough and nuanced approach yields amazing results for our clients.

manager.name: Caitlyn Zeiss
manager.describe: Caitlyn started Handshake in her senior year of college, determined to pioneer a new way of crafting livable spaces. She leads our teams with clarity, and brings a fresh perspective to each project.

manager.name: Clark Rosenberg
manager.describe: The one who you’ll be interacting most with, Clark is our social champion — his tenacious kindness is only matched by his love of design. Every project we take on is expertly led by Clark and his team.
